response.original_title: Tumsa Nahin Dekha - The Love Story
response.overview: The film starts with Daksh Mittal (Emraan Hashmi), a charming and continually drunk millionaire. One day, he sees a girl, Jiya (Diya Mirza) on the street and falls in love at first sight. Jiya is working as a strip dancer and has a mentally handicapped brother. Daksh and Jiya spend some time with each other and fall in love. Daksh, however, is supposed to marry Anahita Madhwani (Pooja Bharati) in order to inherit a million-dollar trust.
response.title: Tumsa Nahin Dekha - The Love Story
